xwikidoc.content:
platform.flamingo.themes.home.title=플라밍고 테마 ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.currenttheme=Current Theme platform.flamingo.themes.home.otherthemes=기타 사용 가능한 테마 platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningOldColorThemeInstalled=Flamingo 테마를 관리하는 애플리케이션입니다. Flamingo 테마는 Flamingo를 기반으로 하는 모든 스킨의 사용자 정의 가능한 변형입니다. Colibri 기반 스킨의 색상 테마를 관리하려면 {0}Colibri 색상 테마 애플리케이션{1}으로 이동해야 합니다. platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningCurrentOldColorTheme=현재 테마는 Flamingo 기반 스킨에 최적화되어 있지 않은 Colibri 컬러 테마입니다. 우리는 호환되도록 최선을 다했지만 결과가 최적이 아닐 수도 있습니다. platform.flamingo.themes.home.useThisTheme=이 테마를 사용하세요 platform.flamingo.themes.home.newThemeName=테마 이름… platform.flamingo.themes.home.create=새 테마 만들기 platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.invalid=테마 이름이 잘못되었습니다! platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.csrf=보안상의 이유로 "{0}"이라는 테마를 생성할지 확인하세요. platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.confirm=확인하다 platform.flamingo.themes.home.set.success=테마가 "{0}"으로 설정되었습니다. platform.flamingo.themes.title.variables=변수 platform.flamingo.themes.title.preview=시사 platform.flamingo.themes.autorefresh=자동 새로고침 platform.flamingo.themes.refresh=새로 고치다 platform.flamingo.themes.refreshwarning=새로 고치는 데 몇 초 정도 걸릴 수 있습니다. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.preview.iframe.label=Preview of the color theme. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.loading=Loading... ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.logos=Logos ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.base-colors=Base colors ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.typography=Typography ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.forms=Forms ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.buttons=Buttons ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.tables=Tables ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.navbar=Navigation Bar ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.dropdowns=Drop downs ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.panels=Panels ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.breadcrumb=Breadcrumb ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.advanced=Advanced ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.defaultvalue=Default ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.lessCode.description=In this field, you can directly write LESS code which will be added into the skin. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.local=Local ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.global=Global
############################################################################### ## Deprecated ## Note: each element should be removed when the last branch using it is no longer supported ###############################################################################
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys start #@deprecatedstart
####################################### ## until 7.3M1 ####################################### ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.lessCode.warning=Unfortunately, this field is not taken into account in the live preview.
####################################### ## until 12.9RC1 ####################################### ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.incompatiblebrowser=Sorry, the preview does not work with this version of Internet Explorer. You need to use a newer browser.
